entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
